title: Misuse of assertTrue in virt test scripts

Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/45015
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/8f5afcb9b66c3ca597e3edad22109641acefdccc
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 8f5afcb9b66c3ca597e3edad22109641acefdccc
Author: Zhongyue Luo <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Sep 4 14:38:49 2013 +0800

    Fixes misuse of assertTrue in virt test scripts
    
    Misuse of assertTrue in places where assertEqual should be used.
    
    If assertTrue is used, the test will always pass
    if the first argument's boolean cast is True.
    The second argument passed to assertTrue() will be regarded
    as the error message when the assertion fails.
    
    Fixes bug #1220541
    
    Change-Id: I63ec4f35ee1a2430a5f6b54e40108b2c4ce3d480
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
